name: Skylar & Plux: Adventure On Clover Island
description: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island is a passionate homage to the 3D platformers of our youth. Go on an action packed adventure, collect gadgets helping you explore a beautiful paradise and save it from evil.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 570 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
